dc_title_s: Descriptio Boloniae Pontieu; comit. S. Pauli cum adjacentibus.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Decorative title cartouche and ships can compass rose on the ocean. Does not match any atlases listed in van der Krogt. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 45 x 55 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
